ai-tha-ap434:2.2_0: The bar will be the best of Buddhas.
ai-tha-ap434:3.3_0: While I was clear at all,
ai-tha-ap434:3.4_0: I saw the supreme being intent on awakening.
ai-tha-ap434:4.1_0: it’s due to a high couch
ai-tha-ap434:4.4_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap434:5.3_0: To me, I am always mindful
ai-tha-ap434:6.3_0: looks all around the four directions,
ai-tha-ap434:7.2_0: they consult me with their lovely,
ai-tha-ap434:8.3_0: even if he is conceived in the mother’s womb;
ai-tha-ap434:9.2_0: endowed with the state of peace,
ai-tha-ap434:9.3_0: Since you’ve plunged into the deathless,
ai-tha-ap434:9.4_0: I’ve attained the state of grace.
ai-tha-ap434:10.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap434:11.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap434:13.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap434:14.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
